Package menu

Class MenuUI

java.lang.Object
base.BaseCRUD
menu.MenuUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Creatable, Deletable, Readable, Updatable
public class MenuUI
extends BaseCRUD
Displays the Menu UI when the user selects Menu in the main UI.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class base.BaseCRUD

    resource

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MenuUI()
    Sets the placeholder in BaseCRUD to Menu to display the string 'Menu' in the console accordingly.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private MenuType chooseMenuType()
    Prompts user to select the type of menu item when creating one.
    void create()
    Prompts the user to enter the name, description and price of the menu item to be created.
    void delete()
    Prompts the user to enter the ID of the menu item to be deleted and saves the changes in the menu file.
    private void displayMenuItems​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems)
    Displays the menu items and their details from an ArrayList of menu items.
    void read()
    Displays the menu items from an ArrayList in the menu file.
    void read​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems)
    Displays the menu items from an ArrayList input.
    void update()
    Prompts the user to enter the ID of the menu item to be updated and saves the changes in the menu file.

    Methods inherited from class base.BaseCRUD

    startUI

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuUI

      public MenuUI()
      Sets the placeholder in BaseCRUD to Menu to display the string 'Menu' in the console accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Prompts the user to enter the name, description and price of the menu item to be created.

    • update

      public void update()
      Prompts the user to enter the ID of the menu item to be updated and saves the changes in the menu file.

    • read

      public void read()
      Displays the menu items from an ArrayList in the menu file.

    • read

      public void read​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems)
      Displays the menu items from an ArrayList input.
      Parameters:
      menuItems - ArrayList of menu items.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Prompts the user to enter the ID of the menu item to be deleted and saves the changes in the menu file.

    • displayMenuItems

      private void displayMenuItems​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems)
      Displays the menu items and their details from an ArrayList of menu items.
      Parameters:
      menuItems - ArrayList of menu items.

    • chooseMenuType

      private MenuType chooseMenuType() throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Prompts user to select the type of menu item when creating one.
      Returns:
      Type of menu item.
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If the user enters an input that is not an enum value in MenuType (MainCourse, Dessert, Drink).
